sections.heading: Board of Education; members; impeachment; grounds
sections.text: Members of the State Board of Education shall be liable to impeachment in the same manner and on the same grounds as other state officers.SourceLaws 1953, c. 320, § 6, p. 1055;Laws 1971, LB 421, § 1;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-326;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 144

79-316.State Board of Education; members; impeachment; grounds.

Members of the State Board of Education shall be liable to impeachment in the same manner and on the same grounds as other state officers.

SourceLaws 1953, c. 320, § 6, p. 1055;Laws 1971, LB 421, § 1;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-326;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 144.
